Recipie.Title: Baked Beans
Recipie.Author: Mrs. A Smith

Steps.Step: Wash and soak one pound navy beans over night.
Boil slowly twenty minutes and drain.
Add 1/2 pound salt pork cut in thick slices.
1/4 cup molasses or brown sugar, salt to taste.
Over with water and bake in slow oven about six hours.
Add water, a little at a time as needed.

Recipie.Title: Butter Beans, Paprika and Piquillo Peppers (2)
Recipie.Author: Selin Kiazim

Description.p: These beans are great in salads. Let the mix cool and then toss through a selection of salad leaves and herbs. Perk up the leaves with a little olive oil and vinegar and some crispy lavash on top.

Ingredients.Ingredient: 125 ml (about ½ cup), divided extra-virgin olive oil
2 14-oz cans, dried and rinsedbutter beans or lima beans

Steps.Step: In a wide-based pan over a medium heat, caramelize the red onions in 5 Tbsp. of the olive oil for 15 minutes or until they turn golden and soft. Add a little fine salt, the garlic and spices and continue to cook for 2–3 minutes. Add the tomato purée and cook for another minute.
Add the beans and sherry vinegar and reduce the liquid by half over a medium heat. Turn the heat off. Add the piquillo peppers and the remaining olive oil and season with salt to serve.
